name: Frozen Trigger
description:
The world has frozen over! You have to fight your way through a bunker full of cyborgs to destroy a machine supposed to end Climate Change gone haywire. 

Controls:

-Movement: WASD

-Aim: Mouse

-Shoot: Left Mouse Button

-To craft click on the latch on the menu after  putting in all 3 pieces

-You can slow down time with  right click, in case the game is too hard.

Wildcards Used:

-Four Color Limit

-Thermometer
